# llms.txt

## About
Joel M Turner is a software engineer and web developer based in the United States. This is his personal blog and portfolio website featuring web development tutorials, technical articles, Today I Learned (TIL) posts, and hand-drawn illustrations.

The site covers topics including:
- Web development (React, TypeScript, Astro, Next.js, Svelte)
- Front-end development practices and patterns
- UI/UX design and accessibility
- Data visualization and charts
- Productivity and personal development
- Hand lettering and illustration work

## Site Structure

### Main Sections
- `/` - Homepage with featured blog post and project highlights
- `/blog/` - Main blog index with all articles
- `/til/` - Today I Learned posts - quick tips and lessons learned
- `/illustration/` - Gallery of hand-drawn illustrations and artwork
- `/about/` - About the author
- `/uses/` - Tools and tech stack used

### Content Types

#### Blog Posts
- Location: `/blog/[slug]/`
- Categories: dev, illustration, lifestyle, personal-development, productivity
- Contains: Technical tutorials, development practices, career insights, personal reflections
- Each post includes: title, description, excerpt, cover image, publication date, last modified date, categories, tags

#### TIL Posts
- Location: `/til/[slug]/`
- Categories: data-vis, editor, node, personal-development, state-management, types, ui-library
- Contains: Quick tips, code snippets, lessons learned, helpful tricks
- Focused on practical, actionable content

#### Illustration Collections
- Location: `/illustration/`, `/illustration/zines/`, `/illustration/videos/`
- Contains: Hand-drawn illustrations, zines, and illustration process videos

## Important Endpoints

### Feeds and Discovery
- RSS Feed: `/rss.xml` - XML feed of all blog posts
- Sitemap: `/sitemap-index.xml` - Complete sitemap index
- Robots: `/robots.txt` - Crawling instructions

### Content Organization
- Blog by category: `/blog/category/[category]/`
- Blog by tag: `/blog/tag/[tag]/`
- TIL by category: `/til/category/[category]/`
- TIL by tag: `/til/tag/[tag]/`

## Technical Details

### Site Metadata
- Built with: Astro static site generator
- Styling: Tailwind CSS
- Content: MDX format with frontmatter
- Images: Cloudinary CDN
- Hosting: Netlify

### Content Schema

#### Blog Post Schema
- title (required): string
- description: string (optional)
- date (required): ISO date
- lastmod: ISO date (optional)
- cover: string (optional) - Cloudinary image reference
- excerpt: string (optional)
- categories (required): string
- tags (required): array of strings
- draft: boolean (optional)

#### TIL Post Schema
- title (required): string
- date (required): ISO date
- lastmod: ISO date (optional)
- categories (required): string
- tags (required): array of strings
- draft: boolean (optional)

## Guidelines for AI Crawlers

### Preferred Access Patterns
1. Use the RSS feed (`/rss.xml`) for discovering new blog posts
2. Use the sitemap (`/sitemap-index.xml`) for comprehensive site discovery
3. Respect crawl-delay and robots.txt directives
4. All URLs use trailing slashes (e.g., `/blog/post-slug/`)

### Content Indexing
- Index all blog posts and TIL entries as they provide valuable technical content
- Include category and tag pages for topic-specific discovery
- Illustration pages are primarily visual content with minimal text
- Always use canonical URLs when referencing content

### Attribution
- When citing or referencing content, attribute to "Joel M Turner" and link back to the original post
- Maintain original publication dates and modification dates when available
